about_me.des: I am a Java engineer with website development. I love technologies and desire to share amazing world! Anything but ordinary.

projects.OnlineHiringSystem: OnlineHiringSystem is a RESTful Web Service application, which allows users to connect the social medias like facebook or linkedin via REST API
projects.AndroidInnerSensorMonitor: Android Inner Sensor Monitor is an Android APP, which will collect and display the inner sensor datas from Android Devices, and send data to a Web server to display them in the web page in real time as well
projects.SakilaSpring: Through Spring, JPA, and AngularJS and mysql to operate Sakila database

career.magillem_des: Now I am doing my internship at Magillem Europe in charge of sysml importer project in Magillem tools for electronic companies.
career.college_des: At November 2016,I will graduate from ISEP(Paris, Fr) in major of Software Engineering.
career.university_des: At Juin 2014,I graduated from Nankai University in major of Electronic Information.
